TargetUVLayer: UV channel to use for the target mesh
bHideSourceMesh: If true, hide the source mesh
SourceNormalMap: Source mesh normal map; if empty, the geometric normals will be used
SourceNormalMapUVLayer: UV channel to use for the source mesh normal map; only relevant if a source normal map is set
SourceNormalSpace: Normal space of the source mesh normal map.
ProjectionDistance:
Maximum allowed distance for the projection from target mesh to source mesh for the sample to be considered valid.
This is only relevant if a separate source mesh is provided.
bProjectionInWorldSpace:
If true, uses the world space positions for the projection from target mesh to source mesh, otherwise it uses their object space positions.
This is only relevant if a separate source mesh is provided.
